translated: The Elder Who Gave a Palm Leaf
to Tissa, related to the sun,
I extinguish the fire of passion,
and the fire of hatred beyond that,
and I extinguish the fire of delusion,
this is the fruit of the palm leaf.
in the Dispensation of the Buddha.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the palm leaf.
